name: movementengineer
description: Movement Engineer is a client-side tool for exploring, authoring, and comparing structured data about social movements using the Markdown v2.3 dataset format.

scripts.build: npm run check:no-legacy && node tools/build-dist.mjs && npm run check:no-legacy
scripts.test: npm run check:no-legacy && node tests/node/markdownDatasetLoader.test.js && node tests/node/viewModels.test.js && node tests/node/comparisonServices.test.js && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:smoke: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e:smoke
